grid.sql: SELECT DISTINCT t.rekvid, t.id, r.parentid, r.regkood, r.nimetus AS asutus, r.muud AS asutus_tais, t.nimetus AS nimi, t.email FROM palk.cur_tootajad t INNER JOIN ou.rekv r ON r.id = t.rekvid WHERE (lopp IS NULL OR lopp >= $1::DATE) AND (t.email IS NOT NULL AND NOT empty(t.email) AND t.email LIKE '%@%') AND t.rekvid IN (SELECT rekv_id FROM get_asutuse_struktuur($2)) AND t.rekvid = (CASE WHEN $3::INTEGER IS NULL OR empty($3::INTEGER) THEN $2::INTEGER ELSE t.rekvid END) AND t.id NOT IN ( SELECT (propertis ->> 'isik_id')::INTEGER FROM ou.logs WHERE doc_id = 213041 AND propertis ->> 'event' = 'email' AND month((timestamp)::DATE) = month($1::DATE) AND year(timestamp::DATE) = year($1::DATE) ) ORDER BY r.parentid, t.rekvid, t.id
